metadata.name: Meditating Maximalist
metadata.description:
"Meditating Maximalist" or "Hodling Meditation" is an NFT collection that comprises 134 unique and one-of-a-kind digital artworks. The collection depicts the discipline and transcendence of the ultimate hodler, the bitcoin maximalist. Each piece in the collection features a meditating maximalist monk embracing maximalist philosophy, that is, bitcoin is time, bitcoin is energy, bitcoin is money, bitcoin is the future. 
This collection is a must-have for any bitcoin maximalist or anyone looking to bring a touch of serenity to their digital assets.
